segments.text: I'm watching the children, and they're quite a pair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself to get into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, hands open, ready to receive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly partners in crime, a little team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's impressive how they coordinate without a single word.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance on that wobbly stool is rather remarkable, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to applaud their ingenuity and stealth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood escapades.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They probably think they're being incredibly sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And in a way, they are, considering the adult's distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll enjoy those cookies, I'm sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, playing out right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
